text: Imagine if you could instantly teleport to MIT
and become an MIT student for one glorious day!
You would visit a lab of your choice,
pick a couple classes to sit in on,
and have lunch with the OpenCourseWare team.
Then you’d go on a special private tour of MIT.
We’ll show you where the best stuff is.
This is not a wild fantasy.
It’s real!
Well, not the teleportation part.
But if you win our MIT Student for a Day sweepstakes,
we’ll fly you to Cambridge Massachusetts,
put you up in a fancy hotel,
feed you,
deck you out in MIT gear,
and give you the FULL MIT EXPERIENCE.
For one single terrific day.

Your donation to OCW will help us continue
to serve the thousands of people who use our

website every day – educators and learners
who are looking to gain knowledge, and improve
their life and community.
No purchase necessary to enter.
Good luck!
